statements: SELECT * FROM user_login;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_login WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_login WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, username, email, last_login FROM user_login WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_login ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_login WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_login WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_login WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_login;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_login ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT data_name, data_value, data_id FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_name = 'Credit Card Information';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe' OR username = 'jane_doe';
SELECT user_id, data_name, data_value FROM user_credentials JOIN sensitive_data ON user_credentials.user_id = sensitive_data.data_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, token FROM authentication ORDER BY auth_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, data_description FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.token, s.data_description FROM users u JOIN authentication a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN sensitive_data s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, s.data_description FROM users u JOIN sensitive_data s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.data_value < 5000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT data_content FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT ur.user_id, r.role_name FROM user_roles ur JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT s.session_id, u.username FROM sessions s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id;
